Package org.apache.struts.apps.mailreader.dao.impl.memory

Class MemoryUserDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.apps.mailreader.dao.impl.memory.MemoryUserDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDatabase
    public final class MemoryUserDatabase
extends Object
implements UserDatabase

    Concrete implementation of UserDatabase for an in-memory database backed by an XML data file.

    Since:
    Struts 1.1
    Version:
    $Rev$ $Date$
    Author:
